location: Yanping South Road, Zhongzheng District, near West Gate MRT (199m)
notes: Modern, newly furnished 2BR/2BA apartment on 9F with elevator access, floor-to-ceiling windows providing excellent natural light. Good for a couple with baby: elevator for stroller access, mid-high floor away from street noise, and near MRT/schools/shops. Note the two balconies may need baby-proofing for railings, and floor-to-ceiling windows should be checked for child safety locks. NT$100K/month is premium pricing but includes full furnishing and parking.
